feed.title: Openreads Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Openreads: v2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: Summary

  • iOS release.
  • Additional reading dates.
  • Open Library search modes.
  • Connection to Open Library with SSL.
  • Auto downloading covers from Open Library.
  • Importing books from BookWyrm.
  • Bulk delete books.
  • Auto reading length is at least one day.
  • Publisher info in Open Library editions.
  • Filter out books with selected tags.
  • Keyboard can be dismissed on tap on screen.
  • Small UI/UX improvements and bug fixes.

:safety_vest: Contributions

  • docs: Added CONTRIBUTING.MD by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/399
  • Enabling iOS support by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/398
  • Added CI job to check if code is formatted by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/400
  • Search Open Library by more than general query by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/401
  • Button to add book when nothing found in OL by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/402
  • fix: Changed OL connections from http to https by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/406
  • feat: Auto download covers from Open Library (single book and bulk) by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/407
  • ci: Flutter version as env variable by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/408
  • feat: Tap on fastest slowest book, added covers to stats by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/409
  • feat: Automatically import covers after csv import by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/410
  • feat: Import books from BookWyrm CSV file by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/411
  • docs: Added alternativeto link to README by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/412
  • feat: Bulk delete books by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/413
  • docs: Readme update by @apobrt in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/415
  • Build/ios release fixes by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/427
  • Start the count always from 1 by @apobrt in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/367
  • Move "Unfinished Books" screen button to dot menu on main screen by @th8m0z in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/428
  • Added publisher info to edition view by @th8m0z in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/429
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/403
  • fix: Original tags controller was shadowed by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/430
  • fix: Corrected destination of unfinished books and settings menu by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/431
  • feat: Filter out books with selected tags by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/432
  • Additional reading dates by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/436
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/435
  • Missed stuff for additional readings by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/440
  • Build/release 48 by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/441
  • Fix/misc fixes by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/445
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/438
  • Implemented Keyboard Dismissible by @th8m0z in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/442
  • 446 bug adding an empty tag leads to an exception by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/447

New Contributors

  • @th8m0z made their first contribution in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/pull/428

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads-android/compare/v2.3.0...v.2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Openreads: v2.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: Summary

  • Fixed UI issues with incomplete reading dates

:safety_vest: Contributions

  • build(ios): Updated iOS MARKETING_VERSION by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/450

entry.title: New release for Openreads: v2.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: Summary

  • Editing currently set cover.
  • Increased tag limit to 100 characters.
  • Added auto "owned" tag.
  • Tags are sorted alphabetically.
  • Counter for book readings.
  • Added croatian language.
  • Sorting by date added or date modified.
  • Subtitle is fetched for Open Library book editions.
  • Book status for new book is auto filled depending on what book list user was on.
  • User can set default book format.
  • Fix: Sorting by pages works correctly.
  • Fix: Adding book buttons work with disabled animations (Android).
  • Fix: Total statistics include finished books with no finish date set.
  • Fix: Dates are displayed according to user's locale.
  • Fix: Tags suggestions are filtered.

:safety_vest: Contributions

  • feat: Allowing edit of currently set cover by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/455
  • feat: Increased tag limit to 100 char, code refactor by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/456
  • feat: Added autoadding "owned" tag by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/457
  • feat: Sorting tags alphabetically by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/458
  • fix: Dates should be formatted to locale now by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/460
  • Fixed filtering bug in edit book screen #453 by @Mohit-Joshi-dev in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/461
  • feat: Added counter for book readings by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/464
  • l10n: Added croatian language by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/465
  • fix: FIxed sorting books by pages by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/466
  • fix: Corrected URLs for app rating by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/467
  • 419 feature request add date added and date updated sort options by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/473
  • fix: Subtitle is fetched for editions by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/474
  • fix: Adding books buttons work with disabled animations by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/475
  • 472 bug incorrect statistics displayed by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/476
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/454
  • feat: Updated EN strings by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/477
  • 470 feature request optional default fields of a new book by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/478

New Contributors

  • @Mohit-Joshi-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/461

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/compare/v2.4.1...v2.5.0

entry.title: New release for Openreads: v2.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: Summary

  • Fix: Book status is autofilled for books from Open Library.
  • Fix: Sorting by books start or finish dates does not break the list.
  • Fix: Selecting books does not rearrange them.
  • Fix: Editing book's current cover does not require app restart to present the change.
  • Fix: Default book format audiobook is properly shown in settings.
  • Fix: Edit book state does not jitter when typing.

:safety_vest: Contributions

  • 482 bug book status is not autofilled by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/491
  • fix: Sorting by start/finish date parses only readings with start or … by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/492
  • 484 bug selecting books for later re sorts the books by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/494
  • fix: Fixed compatibility with Androids below 7.1.1 by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/495
  • 483 bug old cover is presented after editing current cover by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/497
  • l10n: Added Filipino language by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/498
  • fix: Default book format audiobook is properly sown in settings by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/500
  • chore(android): Migrated gradle due to deprecation in Flutter 3.19.0 by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/502
  • fix(ios): Removed donations mention from iOS build by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/503
  • fix: Removed FutureBuilders for dateFormat that were causing UI reloads by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/504

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/compare/v2.5.0...v2.5.1

entry.title: New release for Openreads: v2.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: Summary

  • Feat: Monochrome icon for Android 14+
  • Feat: Suggestion of author while editing book details
  • Feat: Scan ISBN while editing book details
  • Fix: Improved overflow of text
  • Fix: Displaying list of books with no start/finish dates
  • Fix: Proper selecting of text

:safety_vest: Contributions

  • doc: Added App Store badge to readme by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/512
  • doc: Updated App Store badge by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/513
  • Feature: App icon improvements by @sebastien46 in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/515
  • cicd: Removed signing from Android test build by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/516
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/517
  • Overflow Issues fixed by @th8m0z in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/514
  • build: Upgraded Flutter to 3.19.2 by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/518
  • fix: App will not try to find latest start or finish date for books t… by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/519
  • fix: Fixed multiselect on book and stats screens by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/522
  • Feature: scan button on isbn field. by @Mohit-Joshi-dev in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/521
  • l10n: Added estinian language by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/523
  • 487 feature request suggest author when adding book by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/527
  • doc: Updated Get on App Store icon by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/528
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/526

New Contributors

  • @sebastien46 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/515

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/compare/v2.5.1...v2.6.0
